Returns:
int

getRuptureMetadata

public java.lang.String getRuptureMetadata()
Returns the Metadata for the rupture of a given source. Following information is represented as a single line for the rupture.
  • Source Index
  • Rupture Index
  • Magnitude
  • Probablity
  • Ave. Rake

    If rupture surface is a point surface then point surface locations are included in it.So the next 3 elements are :

  • Point Surface Latitude
  • Point Surface Longitude
  • Point Surface Depth
  • Source Name
Each element in the single line is seperated by a tab ("\t").

Returns:
String

Clones the eqk rupture and returns the new cloned object
